snippet: An Indonesian woman who was gang-raped by men who accused her of having extramarital sex may be caned publicly for violating Islamic law, an official said Wednesday.
abstract: Indonesian woman who was gang-raped by men who accused her of having extramarital sex may be caned publicly for violating Islamic law.
lead_paragraph: An Indonesian woman who was gang-raped by men who accused her of having extramarital sex may be caned publicly for violating Islamic law, an official said Wednesday.

headline.main: Indonesia: Shariah Official Urges That Gang-Rape Victim Be Caned
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Shariah Official Urges That Gang-Rape Victim Be Caned
